nodes.bodyText: nit: can we import TestableCloseableIterator and fit on one line?
Looks like indentation (2 spaces) is off for this file (4 spaces). Can you fix it?

nodes.bodyText: Ah looks like "run checkstyle on this project" from IDEA only applies to non test files whoops!
